DOC.brief_summary: Pilot study test Bipap autoSV Advanced Algorithm full night , in-lab polysomnography ( PSG ) 3 month home patient Central Sleep Apnea , Hunter Cheyne Stokes Respiration , Complex Sleep Apnea .
DOC.brief_title: Bipap Automatic Servo Ventilation ( autoSV ) Advanced Central Apnea Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Participants qualify schedule one full night , attend diagnostic PSG , one full night attend continuous positive airway pressure ( CPAP ) titration , one full night attend BiPAP autoSV Advanced titration PSG . Participants provide BiPAP autoSV Advanced use home 90 day .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males female , age 2175 . 2 . Able willing provide write informed consent . 3 . Diagnosis Central Sleep Apnea Hunter Cheyne Stokes Breathing , Complex Sleep Apnea , Central Apnea current daily Opioid use predominant central sleep apnea . 1 . For participant diagnose Hunter Cheyne Stokes Breathing , least 3 cycle crescendodecrescendo breathe amplitude AND either Central Apnea Index ( CAI ) ≥ 5/hour OR crescendodecrescendo cycle last least 10 consecutive minute attend Diagnostic Polysomnogram ( PSG ) . 2 . For participant diagnosed Central Sleep Apnea current daily Opioid use predominant central sleep apnea , Apnea/Hypopnea Index ( AHI ) ≥ 15 CAI > 5 attend Diagnostic PSG . 3 . For participant diagnose Complex Sleep Apnea , AHI ≥ 15 CAI > 5 CPAP titration . 4 . Systolic blood pressure > 80 mm Hg Visit 1 . 5 . Agreement undergo fullnight , attend Diagnostic PSG . 6 . Agreement undergo fullnight , attend CPAP titration PSG . 7 . Agreement undergo fullnight , attend BiPAP automatic Servo Ventilation ( autoSV ) Advanced titration PSG 1 . Active participation another interventional research study . 2 . Diagnosis acute decompensated heart failure . 3 . Surgery upper airway , nose , sinus middle ear within last 90 day . 4 . Major medical psychiatric condition would interfere demand study ability complete study . For example , severe unstable chronic lung disease , neuromuscular disease , cancer , end stage renal failure . 5 . Qualifying await heart transplantation . 6 . Currently prescribe oxygen therapy ( e.g . need , nocturnal , continuous ) . 7 . At home treatment adapt Servo Ventilation ( ASV ) Bilevel Positive Airway Pressure ( PAP ) therapy . 8 . Unable use PAP therapy due physical ( e.g . facial structural abnormality ) cognitive ( e.g . dementia ) issue . 9 . Participants PAP therapy medically contraindicate . 10 . Uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic ≥ 200 mm Hg/diastolic ≥ 120 mm Hg ) . 11 . Narcolepsy . 12 . Untreated Restless Legs Syndrome . 13 . Periodic Limb Movement arousal index > 20/hr .
